name: Beastmaster
title: Karroch
lore: Karroch was born a child of the stocks. Raised among the wild creatures of the forest, he learned their ways.

wildAxes.name: Wild Axes
wildAxes.description: Throws axes that travel outward then return. Enemies hit take damage and attack more slowly.

callOfTheWild.name: Call of the Wild
callOfTheWild.description: Summons a loyal boar and hawk to fight alongside Beastmaster.

innerBeast.name: Inner Beast
innerBeast.description: Unleashes the inner beast of allies, increasing their attack speed.

primalRoar.name: Primal Roar
primalRoar.description: Releases a powerful roar that stuns the target and pushes aside all enemies in its path.
